# rwmisc

Miscellaneous functions.

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("rwright88/rwmisc")
```

## Examples

An alternative to `base::summary()` for data frames:

```{r}
library(rwmisc)

summary2(airquality)
```
